  <div class="retailrocket-container new_prod_wrapper">
    <header class="retailrocket-widgettitle">
      <span><%=(headerText)%></span>
    </header>
    <div class="swiper-container">
      <ul class="rr-items swiper-wrapper">
        <%
        for (var i = 0 ; i < numberOfItems; ++i) with(items[i]) {
          var tobasket = {
            id: Params.id,
            artikul: ItemId,
            title: Name,
            url: Url,
            img: PictureUrl,
            count: 1,
            price: {
              price: retailrocket.widget.formatNumber(Price, ".", "", 2),
              pp: 1,
              dl_1: 0,
              dl_2: 0,
              dl_o: 0
            },
          };
        %>
        <div class="item-wrapper swiper-slide">
            <li class="retailrocket-item">
              <div class="img"><a href="<%=Url%>" onmousedown='rrApi.recomMouseDown(<%=ItemId%>, { suggester: "<%=suggesterId%>", methodName: "<%=algorithm%>" });'>
                <img  onerror="retailrocket.widget.hideProduct(this)" src="<%=PictureUrl%>" style="width:<%=itemImageWidth%>px;height:<%=itemImageHeight%>px"></a>
              </div>
              <div class="name">
                <a href="<%=Url%>" onmousedown='rrApi.recomMouseDown(<%=ItemId%>, { suggester: "<%=suggesterId%>", methodName: "<%=algorithm%>" });'>
					<%=Model%>
                </a>
              </div>
              <a href="<%=Url%>" class="price" onmousedown='retailrocket.widget.click(<%=ItemId%>,"<%=suggesterId%>","<%=algorithm%>") '><%= Price %> руб.</a>
            </li>
          </div>
        <% } %>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </div>
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  (function (retailrocket) {
    'use strict';

    var retailrocketShowPopup = true;
    
    function waitFor(exitCondition, callback) {
      var checkCount = 10;
      var timeoutms = 1000;

      (function check() {
        if (exitCondition()) {
          callback();
          return;
        }

        if (checkCount === 0) {
          return;
        }

        checkCount -= 1;
        setTimeout(check, timeoutms);
      })();
    }
    
    retailrocket.raybtExit = (function () {
      var successClass = '_success';
      var popupCloseTimeout = 3000;

      function onSubscribe(notifyWidget) {
        notifyWidget.classList.add(successClass);

        setTimeout(function () {
          notifyWidget.classList.remove(successClass);
        }, popupCloseTimeout);
      }
      
      function onCheckChange(form) {
        var sendButton = form.elements['storetrigger-mailrequest-from-send-btn'];
        var emailInput = form.elements['storetrigger-mailrequest-form-email'];
        sendButton.disabled = !sendButton.disabled;
        emailInput.disabled = !emailInput.disabled;
      }

      function buy(button) {
        var $button = window.$(button);
        if ($button.closest('.retailrocket-exit-after').length === 0) {
          $button.clone().appendTo('.retailrocket-exit-after').click();
        }
      }
      
      function widgetPreRender(widget, recoms, renderFn) {
        var filteredRecomsWithNewPrice = [];
        var idsReco = [];
        var msgNew = {};
        var rrDataTimeZone = '1';
        var newPrices = [];
        if (widget.getAttribute('data-rendered-list-type') == 'basket') {
           var cartButton = $('#storetrigger-mailrequest-from-basket-btn');
          cartButton = cartButton.css('display','block')
        }

        recoms.forEach(function (recom) {
          recom.TypePrefix = recom.TypePrefix + ' ' + recom.Model;
          idsReco.push(recom.ItemId);
        });

        idsReco = idsReco.join(',');
        var rrRecomsPost = {
          rr_products: idsReco, 
          rr_zone_id: rrDataTimeZone
        }

        $ = window.jQuery;
        
        $.ajax({
          type: 'POST',
          url: '/admin/ajax/rr_check_products.php',
          data: $.param(rrRecomsPost),
          success: function (msg) {
            var parseRecoms = msg.split('|');

            parseRecoms.forEach(function (parseRecom, i) {
              var newPrice = Number(parseRecom.split(':')[1]);

              newPrices.push(newPrice);
            });
            recoms.forEach(function (recom, i) {
              recom.Price = newPrices[i];

              if (recom.Price > 0) {
                filteredRecomsWithNewPrice.push(recom);
              } 
            });

            renderFn(filteredRecomsWithNewPrice);
          }
        });
      }
      
      $('.retailrocket-subscribe-form').submit(function (e) {
        var mail = $(this).find('#storetrigger-mailrequest-form-email').val();
        var mailDATA = 'rr_email=' + mail;
        
        $.ajax({
          method: "POST",
          url: "https://www.imperiatechno.ru/admin/ajax/rr_collect_email.php", 
          data: mailDATA
        });
        e.preventDefault();
      });
      
      function widgetActive(widget) {
        var algoWidget = widget.getAttribute('data-rendered-list-type'),
            countItems = Number(widget.getAttribute('data-number-of-rendered-items'));

        if (countItems > 0 && algoWidget == 'basket') {
          widget.parentElement.style.display = 'block'
        } else {
          widget.parentElement.style.display = 'none';
        }

        if (retailrocketShowPopup) {
          setTimeout(function(){
            retailrocketShowPopup = false;
            widget.parentNode.classList.remove('rr_none_widget');
          }, 500);
        }
      }

      return {
        buy: buy,
        onSubscribe: onSubscribe,
        onCheckChange: onCheckChange,
        widgetActive: widgetActive,
        widgetPreRender: widgetPreRender
      };
    }());
    
    if (screen.width < 1025) {
      retailrocket.exitIntendWidget.close(true);
    } {
      retailrocket.exitIntendWidget.initialize();
      retailrocket.mailRequestForm.initialize();
      retailrocket.deactivateIfAgreedToReceiveMarketingMail.initialize();
      
      waitFor( 
        function () {
          return ('jQuery' in window);
        },
        function () {
          retailrocket.widget.render('retailrocket-widget-exitintent');
        }
      )
    }
  }(retailrocket));
</script>
</div><div data-retailrocket-markup-block="5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16" initialized="true"></div><!-- Rating@Mail.ru counter -->

                                  <div class="row">

<script type="text/javascript">function put_global_value(number_var,value){switch(number_var){case 1:noSubmit=value;break;case 2:categories_id=value;break;case 3:manufacturers_id=value;break;case 4:products_status=value;break;}}function get_global_value(number_var){switch(number_var){case 1:return noSubmit;break;case 2:return categories_id;break;case 3:return manufacturers_id;break;case 4:return products_status;break;case 5:return filter;break;case 6:return positionMin;break;case 7:return positionMax;break;case 8:return positionSliderMin;break;case 9:return positionSliderMax;break;case 10:return size_position;break;}}</script>

<script id="widget-template-exitintent" type="text/html">
  <div class="retailrocket-container new_prod_wrapper">
    <header class="retailrocket-widgettitle">
      <span><%=(headerText)%></span>
    </header>
    <div class="swiper-container">
      <ul class="rr-items swiper-wrapper">
        <%
        for (var i = 0 ; i < numberOfItems; ++i) with(items[i]) {
          var tobasket = {
            id: Params.id,
            artikul: ItemId,
            title: Name,
            url: Url,
            img: PictureUrl,
            count: 1,
            price: {
              price: retailrocket.widget.formatNumber(Price, ".", "", 2),
              pp: 1,
              dl_1: 0,
              dl_2: 0,
              dl_o: 0
            },
          };
        %>
        <div class="item-wrapper swiper-slide">
            <li class="retailrocket-item">
              <div class="img"><a href="<%=Url%>" onmousedown='rrApi.recomMouseDown(<%=ItemId%>, { suggester: "<%=suggesterId%>", methodName: "<%=algorithm%>" });'>
                <img  onerror="retailrocket.widget.hideProduct(this)" src="<%=PictureUrl%>" style="width:<%=itemImageWidth%>px;height:<%=itemImageHeight%>px"></a>
              </div>
              <div class="name">
                <a href="<%=Url%>" onmousedown='rrApi.recomMouseDown(<%=ItemId%>, { suggester: "<%=suggesterId%>", methodName: "<%=algorithm%>" });'>
					<%=Model%>
                </a>
              </div>
              <a href="<%=Url%>" class="price" onmousedown='retailrocket.widget.click(<%=ItemId%>,"<%=suggesterId%>","<%=algorithm%>") '><%= Price %> руб.</a>
            </li>
          </div>
        <% } %>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </div>
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  (function (retailrocket) {
    'use strict';

    var retailrocketShowPopup = true;
    
    function waitFor(exitCondition, callback) {
      var checkCount = 10;
      var timeoutms = 1000;

      (function check() {
        if (exitCondition()) {
          callback();
          return;
        }

        if (checkCount === 0) {
          return;
        }

        checkCount -= 1;
        setTimeout(check, timeoutms);
      })();
    }
    
    retailrocket.raybtExit = (function () {
      var successClass = '_success';
      var popupCloseTimeout = 3000;

      function onSubscribe(notifyWidget) {
        notifyWidget.classList.add(successClass);

        setTimeout(function () {
          notifyWidget.classList.remove(successClass);
        }, popupCloseTimeout);
      }
      
      function onCheckChange(form) {
        var sendButton = form.elements['storetrigger-mailrequest-from-send-btn'];
        var emailInput = form.elements['storetrigger-mailrequest-form-email'];
        sendButton.disabled = !sendButton.disabled;
        emailInput.disabled = !emailInput.disabled;
      }

      function buy(button) {
        var $button = window.$(button);
        if ($button.closest('.retailrocket-exit-after').length === 0) {
          $button.clone().appendTo('.retailrocket-exit-after').click();
        }
      }
      
      function widgetPreRender(widget, recoms, renderFn) {
        var filteredRecomsWithNewPrice = [];
        var idsReco = [];
        var msgNew = {};
        var rrDataTimeZone = '1';
        var newPrices = [];
        if (widget.getAttribute('data-rendered-list-type') == 'basket') {
           var cartButton = $('#storetrigger-mailrequest-from-basket-btn');
          cartButton = cartButton.css('display','block')
        }

        recoms.forEach(function (recom) {
          recom.TypePrefix = recom.TypePrefix + ' ' + recom.Model;
          idsReco.push(recom.ItemId);
        });

        idsReco = idsReco.join(',');
        var rrRecomsPost = {
          rr_products: idsReco, 
          rr_zone_id: rrDataTimeZone
        }

        $ = window.jQuery;
        
        $.ajax({
          type: 'POST',
          url: '/admin/ajax/rr_check_products.php',
          data: $.param(rrRecomsPost),
          success: function (msg) {
            var parseRecoms = msg.split('|');

            parseRecoms.forEach(function (parseRecom, i) {
              var newPrice = Number(parseRecom.split(':')[1]);

              newPrices.push(newPrice);
            });
            recoms.forEach(function (recom, i) {
              recom.Price = newPrices[i];

              if (recom.Price > 0) {
                filteredRecomsWithNewPrice.push(recom);
              } 
            });

            renderFn(filteredRecomsWithNewPrice);
          }
        });
      }
      
      $('.retailrocket-subscribe-form').submit(function (e) {
        var mail = $(this).find('#storetrigger-mailrequest-form-email').val();
        var mailDATA = 'rr_email=' + mail;
        
        $.ajax({
          method: "POST",
          url: "https://www.imperiatechno.ru/admin/ajax/rr_collect_email.php", 
          data: mailDATA
        });
        e.preventDefault();
      });
      
      function widgetActive(widget) {
        var algoWidget = widget.getAttribute('data-rendered-list-type'),
            countItems = Number(widget.getAttribute('data-number-of-rendered-items'));

        if (countItems > 0 && algoWidget == 'basket') {
          widget.parentElement.style.display = 'block'
        } else {
          widget.parentElement.style.display = 'none';
        }

        if (retailrocketShowPopup) {
          setTimeout(function(){
            retailrocketShowPopup = false;
            widget.parentNode.classList.remove('rr_none_widget');
          }, 500);
        }
      }

      return {
        buy: buy,
        onSubscribe: onSubscribe,
        onCheckChange: onCheckChange,
        widgetActive: widgetActive,
        widgetPreRender: widgetPreRender
      };
    }());
    
    if (screen.width < 1025) {
      retailrocket.exitIntendWidget.close(true);
    } {
      retailrocket.exitIntendWidget.initialize();
      retailrocket.mailRequestForm.initialize();
      retailrocket.deactivateIfAgreedToReceiveMarketingMail.initialize();
      
      waitFor( 
        function () {
          return ('jQuery' in window);
        },
        function () {
          retailrocket.widget.render('retailrocket-widget-exitintent');
        }
      )
    }
  }(retailrocket));
</script>
</div><div data-retailrocket-markup-block="5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16" initialized="true"></div><!-- Rating@Mail.ru counter -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var _tmr = window._tmr || (window._tmr = []);
_tmr.push({id: "3071835", type: "pageView", start: (new Date()).getTime(), pid: "USER_ID"});
(function (d, w, id) {
  if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
  var ts = d.createElement("script"); ts.type = "text/javascript"; ts.async = true; ts.id = id;
  ts.src = "https://top-fwz1.mail.ru/js/code.js";
  var f = function () {var s = d.getElementsByTagName("script")[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ts, s);};
  if (w.opera == "[object Opera]") { d.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", f, false); } else { f(); }
})(document, window, "topmailru-code");

<script id="widget-template-exitintent" type="text/html">
  <div class="retailrocket-container new_prod_wrapper">
    <header class="retailrocket-widgettitle">
      <span><%=(headerText)%></span>
    </header>
    <div class="swiper-container">
      <ul class="rr-items swiper-wrapper">
        <%
        for (var i = 0 ; i < numberOfItems; ++i) with(items[i]) {
          var tobasket = {
            id: Params.id,
            artikul: ItemId,
            title: Name,
            url: Url,
            img: PictureUrl,
            count: 1,
            price: {
              price: retailrocket.widget.formatNumber(Price, ".", "", 2),
              pp: 1,
              dl_1: 0,
              dl_2: 0,
              dl_o: 0
            },
          };
        %>
        <div class="item-wrapper swiper-slide">
            <li class="retailrocket-item">
              <div class="img"><a href="<%=Url%>" onmousedown='rrApi.recomMouseDown(<%=ItemId%>, { suggester: "<%=suggesterId%>", methodName: "<%=algorithm%>" });'>
                <img  onerror="retailrocket.widget.hideProduct(this)" src="<%=PictureUrl%>" style="width:<%=itemImageWidth%>px;height:<%=itemImageHeight%>px"></a>
              </div>
              <div class="name">
                <a href="<%=Url%>" onmousedown='rrApi.recomMouseDown(<%=ItemId%>, { suggester: "<%=suggesterId%>", methodName: "<%=algorithm%>" });'>
					<%=Model%>
                </a>
              </div>
              <a href="<%=Url%>" class="price" onmousedown='retailrocket.widget.click(<%=ItemId%>,"<%=suggesterId%>","<%=algorithm%>") '><%= Price %> руб.</a>
            </li>
          </div>
        <% } %>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </div>
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  (function (retailrocket) {
    'use strict';

    var retailrocketShowPopup = true;
    
    function waitFor(exitCondition, callback) {
      var checkCount = 10;
      var timeoutms = 1000;

      (function check() {
        if (exitCondition()) {
          callback();
          return;
        }

        if (checkCount === 0) {
          return;
        }

        checkCount -= 1;
        setTimeout(check, timeoutms);
      })();
    }
    
    retailrocket.raybtExit = (function () {
      var successClass = '_success';
      var popupCloseTimeout = 3000;

      function onSubscribe(notifyWidget) {
        notifyWidget.classList.add(successClass);

        setTimeout(function () {
          notifyWidget.classList.remove(successClass);
        }, popupCloseTimeout);
      }
      
      function onCheckChange(form) {
        var sendButton = form.elements['storetrigger-mailrequest-from-send-btn'];
        var emailInput = form.elements['storetrigger-mailrequest-form-email'];
        sendButton.disabled = !sendButton.disabled;
        emailInput.disabled = !emailInput.disabled;
      }

      function buy(button) {
        var $button = window.$(button);
        if ($button.closest('.retailrocket-exit-after').length === 0) {
          $button.clone().appendTo('.retailrocket-exit-after').click();
        }
      }
      
      function widgetPreRender(widget, recoms, renderFn) {
        var filteredRecomsWithNewPrice = [];
        var idsReco = [];
        var msgNew = {};
        var rrDataTimeZone = '1';
        var newPrices = [];
        if (widget.getAttribute('data-rendered-list-type') == 'basket') {
           var cartButton = $('#storetrigger-mailrequest-from-basket-btn');
          cartButton = cartButton.css('display','block')
        }

        recoms.forEach(function (recom) {
          recom.TypePrefix = recom.TypePrefix + ' ' + recom.Model;
          idsReco.push(recom.ItemId);
        });

        idsReco = idsReco.join(',');
        var rrRecomsPost = {
          rr_products: idsReco, 
          rr_zone_id: rrDataTimeZone
        }

        $ = window.jQuery;
        
        $.ajax({
          type: 'POST',
          url: '/admin/ajax/rr_check_products.php',
          data: $.param(rrRecomsPost),
          success: function (msg) {
            var parseRecoms = msg.split('|');

            parseRecoms.forEach(function (parseRecom, i) {
              var newPrice = Number(parseRecom.split(':')[1]);

              newPrices.push(newPrice);
            });
            recoms.forEach(function (recom, i) {
              recom.Price = newPrices[i];

              if (recom.Price > 0) {
                filteredRecomsWithNewPrice.push(recom);
              } 
            });

            renderFn(filteredRecomsWithNewPrice);
          }
        });
      }
      
      $('.retailrocket-subscribe-form').submit(function (e) {
        var mail = $(this).find('#storetrigger-mailrequest-form-email').val();
        var mailDATA = 'rr_email=' + mail;
        
        $.ajax({
          method: "POST",
          url: "https://www.imperiatechno.ru/admin/ajax/rr_collect_email.php", 
          data: mailDATA
        });
        e.preventDefault();
      });
      
      function widgetActive(widget) {
        var algoWidget = widget.getAttribute('data-rendered-list-type'),
            countItems = Number(widget.getAttribute('data-number-of-rendered-items'));

        if (countItems > 0 && algoWidget == 'basket') {
          widget.parentElement.style.display = 'block'
        } else {
          widget.parentElement.style.display = 'none';
        }

        if (retailrocketShowPopup) {
          setTimeout(function(){
            retailrocketShowPopup = false;
            widget.parentNode.classList.remove('rr_none_widget');
          }, 500);
        }
      }

      return {
        buy: buy,
        onSubscribe: onSubscribe,
        onCheckChange: onCheckChange,
        widgetActive: widgetActive,
        widgetPreRender: widgetPreRender
      };
    }());
    
    if (screen.width < 1025) {
      retailrocket.exitIntendWidget.close(true);
    } {
      retailrocket.exitIntendWidget.initialize();
      retailrocket.mailRequestForm.initialize();
      retailrocket.deactivateIfAgreedToReceiveMarketingMail.initialize();
      
      waitFor( 
        function () {
          return ('jQuery' in window);
        },
        function () {
          retailrocket.widget.render('retailrocket-widget-exitintent');
        }
      )
    }
  }(retailrocket));
</script>
</div><div data-retailrocket-markup-block="5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16" initialized="true"></div><!-- Rating@Mail.ru counter -->
